sentences.sentence: He experienced different cultures during his peregrination.
sentences.translation: 在国外的游历使他体验到不同的文化。

sentences.sentence: In the course of this peregrination, each participant visited six of the 90 food stalls in the market.
sentences.translation: 在游历市场的过程中，每个参与者都光顾了90个食物摊点中的6个。

sentences.sentence: The evergreen dramatic does disciplines a. m. and night, even when he has to peregrination for filming, along to Sina. com.
sentences.translation: 据新浪网报道，这位影坛常青树每天早晚都要做此种运动，即便是外出拍电影。
